metadata.image_prompt_built:
High-quality professional section transition background: modern research laboratory, scientific equipment, experimental facility, discovery and innovation, academic research.

Style: photorealistic, modern, clean, professional, subtle
Composition: Clean and minimal, darker RIGHT side for text overlay, lighter LEFT side
Mood: Professional, transitional, forward-moving
Lighting: Natural, soft, appropriate for section break

MAIN SUBJECT: Market Analysis, Competitive Landscape
The image MUST prominently feature visual elements related to: Market Analysis, Competitive Landscape

CRITICAL: Absolutely NO text, words, letters, numbers, or typography of any kind in the image.
